trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Northville
There were no other sightings in Northville on or around November 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my friend's porch with my friend while he was talking to his girlfriend on the phone. All of the sudden there was a bright light shaped like a diamond that appeared above our heads. My friend's girlfriend said she saw the shape too. All of a sudden it cast a blinding light on us, and I can't remember anything else. Can you please tell me what has happened? I dont want it to happen again, if there is anything you can do please help us.
Summary: I was sitting on the porch with my friend and a light come towards us shaped like a diamond and took us away.
